fungal infection.description: Fungal infection is a health condition that can affect people and may require medical attention. It usually presents with common symptoms and may need diagnosis and treatment.. Fungal infection is a condition characterized by specific pathophysiological mechanisms. Diagnosis typically involves clinical evaluation and laboratory tests, and treatment may include pharmacological and/or non-pharmacological interventions
